buyer.official_name: Mohill Station House Company Limited By Guarantee

procedure.title: Refurbishment, Upgrade and Conservation of vacant Railway Station Buildings to Office/Workspace Hub with Café facilities at: Mohill Narrow Gauge Railway Station, Coolbawn, Mohill, Co. Leitrim, N41CN1
procedure.description: The works comprising first phase of the rejuvenation of Mohill Railway Station will be to the existing Railway Station Buildings, forecourt, entrance, connection to existing services – contract programme period for the works – 8-9 months The works will include restoration/re-building of the existing stone wall to side and rear of Station Buildings, part of glazed link and accessible toilet to facilitate the provision of fully serviced office/workspace, as follows:- • Conserve, refurbish and upgrade Station Building. • Re-build low stone wall to create new external dining area and garden. • Reinstate platform to front of station building. • Alterations to existing entrance. • Access roadway on existing railway line. • Carparks for station house and visitors – 11 no. spaces. • Connection to existing services. • Landscaping and fencing. • Provision of safe working site and compound.
